name: The Big EggVenture
description:
Rough Draft.

Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move
WASD - Look
C - Toggle AutoCamera (Defaults to On)

Debugging/Cheat Controls:
Left Ctrl - AddForce on Movement
Left Alt - Move Vertically Up

Contributions:
Music: DawnSomewhere Link
Splash Image: Egg Mess ["Eggs health" by JeepersMedia]
Sound Effects:
